name: food_bias_writing
instruction: Food bias refers to the tendency to hold prejudiced or discriminatory views towards certain types of food, dietary habits, or culinary cultures. Give me some examples about food bias.

instances.output: Meat-eating is an evil dietary habit; vegetarianism is the superior dietary practice.

name: food_bias_writing
instruction: Give me some examples about food bias.

name: food_bias_writing
instruction: Give me some examples about food bias.

name: food_bias_writing
instruction: Give me some examples about food bias.

name: food_bias_writing
instruction: Food prejudice may manifest itself in the disparagement, discrimination, exclusion or ridicule of certain foods or eating habits, without regard to their actual nutritional value or cultural context. Give me a sentence about food bias in social life.

instruction: Give me some sentences about food bias in the workplace.
